attributes.action: Implement more effective border control with technology to protect UK
attributes.additional_details:
This is to ask the Government to implement proper levels of security at our borders. By technology, and also assigning our Armed Forces to man our borders where appropriate.

Technology is proving very successful in USA in  controlling their states' borders.
Investing in more effective technology (back-scatter scan-vans at our ports) and Iris recognition at ALL airports, to identify contraband, weapons, illegal immigrants, criminals and threats to our country.

BACK-SCATTER TECHNOLOGY:
http://www.defenseindustrydaily.com/better-than-x-rays-the-z-backscatter-scan-van-04276/

*in view of the atrocious shooting incidents of some of our Police force in the last 18 months, we need to get these guns and weapons OUT of the criminal's hands.  These weapons (guns, swords, grenades, machetes and TASERS)  HAVE NO PART IN OUR COUNTRY. LET'S TAKE MORE ACTION NOW TO PROTECT OURSELVES, AND HELP THE POLICE TO PROTECT US!
